description: Erection of an additional floor at roof level, including installation of a rooflight on top of the flat roof, formation of front parapet wall, erection of 2no. dormer windows to the front elevation, 1no. dormer window and 1no. dormer French door with a Juliette balcony to the rear elevation; removal of the existing pitched roof of back addition to form a new flat roof on top, and re-sizing, repositioning and replacement of an existing window with a new window to the rear elevation of first floor back addition; alterations to fenestration to the rear elevation at ground floor level to include, installation of 2no. glazed doors following the removal of existing door and window; replacement of existing glass roof with a new glass roof to the pitched roof of the existing single storey side extension; alteration to fenestration to the front elevation of existing single storey garage outbuilding in the rear garden to include, installation of 2no. glazed doors following the removal of existing door.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
